thread.title: Suicide Squad is now an Oscar-winning movie and people can't cope | Metro News
thread.title_full: Suicide Squad is now an Oscar-winning movie and people can't cope | Metro News

author: Caroline Westbrook For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Suicide Squad is now an Oscar-winning movie and people can't cope | Metro News
text:
Caroline Westbrook for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 2:26 am Yes everybody, Suicide Squad won an Oscar. (Picture: Warner Bros) 
We never thought we’d ever say the words Suicide Squad and Oscar winner in the same sentence – but now we can. 
Because – to the amazement of many – the movie only went and nabbed itself an Academy Award at the ceremony on Sunday night. 
Yes, the much-maligned critical turkey is now the proud owner of the Oscar for best make-up and hairstyling, with the trio of Alessandro Bertolazzi, Giorgio Gregorini, and Christopher Nelson picking up the trophy. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video Congrats Alessandro Bertolazzi, Giorgio Gregorini & Christopher Nelson. This marks the team’s first Academy Award. #Oscars #SuicideSquad pic.twitter.com/NpynH5SXNa 
— Suicide Squad (@SuicideSquadWB) February 27, 2017 
And no, you can’t quite get your head round it. me when suicide squad won pic.twitter.com/enVZMREBpm
